# Support rows defined on several lines

Requirement: A backslash at the end of a line indicates that in the cell below
should be treated as in *the same row*

.
A         | B
----------|-------
text:     | 1     \
- over    | 2     \
- several |       \
- lines   |
.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>A</th>
<th>B</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<p>text:</p>
<ul>
<li>over</li>
<li>several</li>
<li>lines</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td>
<p>1
2</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.

Another possible form of multilines table.

.
A         | B     |
----------|-------|
text:     | 1     |\
- over    | 2     |\
- several |       |\
- lines   |       |
.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>A</th>
<th>B</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<p>text:</p>
<ul>
<li>over</li>
<li>several</li>
<li>lines</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td>
<p>1
2</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.

The colspan feature should be still available in multilines.

.
A      | B     | C       | D    | E
-------|-------|---------|------|------
large  || another        |||\
single || single         |||\
row    || row            |||
.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>A</th>
<th>B</th>
<th>C</th>
<th>D</th>
<th>E</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td colspan="2">
<p>large
single
row</p>
</td>
<td colspan="3">
<p>another
single
row</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.

(#19) Nested Lists in Multiline Row

.
A         | B     |
----------|-------|
text:     | 1     |\
- over    | 2     |\
- several |       |\
  - lines |       |
.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>A</th>
<th>B</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<p>text:</p>
<ul>
<li>over</li>
<li>several
<ul>
<li>lines</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td>
<p>1
2</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.

(#19) Code Blocks in Multiline Row

.
    code               | describe  |
-----------------------|-----------|
```python              |           |\
for i in range(5):     | Print a   |\
    print('*' * 5)     | square.   |\
```                    |           |
    for i in range(5): | Print a   |\
        print('*' * i) | triangle. |
.
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>code</th>
<th>describe</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>
<pre><code class="language-python">for i in range(5):
    print('*' * 5)
</code></pre>
</td>
<td>
<p>Print a
square.</p>
</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
<pre><code>for i in range(5):
    print('*' * i)</code></pre>
</td>
<td>
<p>Print a
triangle.</p>
</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
.
